bibl.title: Palaeography and Bilingualism: P. Duk. inv. 320 and 675.
bibl.note: P. Duke Inv. 320. Private letter. Arsinoite, 23-I - 1-II 210 / 19-I - 5-II 193 B.C. Greek letter written with a brush. - Inv. 675. Top portion: private letter in Greek. Provenance unknown, 195-194 B.C. The bottom half of the papyrus contains a private letter in Demotic, written with a pen.
bibl.seg: SOSIN Joshua D. and Joseph G. MANNING, Palaeography and Bilingualism: P. Duk. inv. 320 and 675.

P. Duke Inv. 320. Private letter. Arsinoite, 23-I - 1-II 210 / 19-I - 5-II 193 B.C. Greek letter written with a brush. - Inv. 675. Top portion: private letter in Greek. Provenance unknown, 195-194 B.C. The bottom half of the papyrus contains a private letter in Demotic, written with a pen.
